full_summary:
====================================

### Title and Reference Number

* **Title (English)**: Supply of Snowmobiles to the Department of Fisheries & Oceans Canada
* **Title (French)**: Fourniture de motoneiges pour le ministère des Pêches et des Océans du Canada
* **Reference Number**: WS3631691023
* **Procurement ID**: F5204-220289

### Summary and Scope

This public tender announcement invites interested suppliers to provide quotations for the supply of four (4) snowmobiles to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada – Conservation & Protection Branch – Fredericton, New Brunswick. The snowmobiles are required for winter resource enforcement patrolling.

### Tender Detail

* **Closing Date and Time**: October 6, 2022 at 14:00 ADT (local time)
* **Contract Duration**: November 29, 2022 to January 6, 2023
* **Procurement Category**: Goods
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: *Fredericton*

### Contact Information

* The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), represented by the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) for this procurement.
* The lead contact is Arseneau, Danny and can be reached via email at danny.arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Notice URL and Attachments

* The full tender notice can be accessed via this URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14126449?extsite=MTQxMjY0NDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== [2]
* There are no supporting attachments for this tender.

### Tender Status

NOTICE: This tender has been cancelled as of the date of publication.

(However, must mentioned in previous notice that tender seeker must disregard this notice on Ariba Discovery).
